lead_paragraph: "Lord Haw Haw," Germany's anonymous radio commentator who has kept up a verbal attack on the British throughout the Winter, has finally revealed his true identity and confirmed that he is William Joyce.
abstract: Lord Haw Haw revealed as W Joyce; por
snippet: "Lord Haw Haw," Germany's anonymous radio commentator who has kept up a verbal attack on the British throughout the Winter, has finally revealed his true identity and confirmed that he is William Joyce....
